title: Scholarship Donation
description: 100% of donations from our Give Butter platform go directly to the scholarship pool for that year.Scholarships have a limit of $500 per student. Any excess is added to form the next scholarship.

title: Apply
description: .ILF is always in need of direct donations. Donations to our Paypal platform go directly to organizational costs and operations. Donations assist with logistics such as: travel, monthly subscription fees, and even award plaques for scholarship recipients.

title: Collaborate
description: ILF accepts both checks and cash. Please complete our google form to ensure we have a record of your donation. A donation letter will be electronically provided back within 2-3 business days. *ILF also accepts gifts at its own discretion. If donating a gift please send a direct email with more details before mailing or filling out the form
